flawed_nl_solution:
If Evan had 200 books two years ago, he currently has 200-40 = <<200-40=160>>160 books.
In five years, Evan will have 60 more than 160*5 = 800 books which is the number he has now.
This means Evan will have 800+60 = <<800+60=850>>850 books in five years.
#### 850

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 860, not 850. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
